data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Zuid-Holland. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zuid-Holland, Netherlands
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Zuid-Holland, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Zuid-Holland, Netherlands to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: God, guide the 143,722 believers in Zuid-Holland to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Sarnami Hindi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Sarnami Hindi people.
Please, convict the 143,722 believers in Zuid-Holland, Netherlands to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Zuid-Holland do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 3,581,500 people living in Zuid-Holland, Netherlands. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.
